entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Îles-de-la-Madeleine
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Îles de la Madeleine Airport 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: 3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: 0.6°C
Wind: W 37 km/h gust 47 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the afternoon. Amount 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
